mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.eacct_no AS "eacctNo", a.pay_account AS "payAccount", a.pay_account_name AS "payAccountName", a.amount AS "amount", a.channel_flow_no AS "channelFlowNo", a.bank_flow_no AS "bankFlowNo", a.usage AS "usage", a.platform_summary AS "platformSummary", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_shanghai_bank_trigser_record( eacct_no, pay_account, pay_account_name, amount, channel_flow_no, bank_flow_no, usage, platform_summary, update_date, create_date ) VALUES ( #{eacctNo}, #{payAccount}, #{payAccountName}, #{amount}, #{channelFlowNo}, #{bankFlowNo}, #{usage}, #{platformSummary}, now(), now() )
